title: Vibration not working on Pixel 2XL
content:
Hiya!
Last night my Pixel 2XL stopped vibrating all of a sudden.

Spent a bit of time on Google, and people with similar issues simply had wrong settings, I checked and I don't. Even downloaded a "test android" app and tried to make that force vibrations, nothing.

So I was going to contact support but was led here first, figured I'd give it a shot & ask if anyone has experienced similar issues and somehow fixed them, or will I have to send it off?

Cheers
